text: Kaysa is a flexible and customizable slider component for modern web applications.
target: The container element where the slider will be applied. (REQUIRED)
scrollSpeed: Determines the scrolling speed (value between 0.1‚Äì1). Default: 0.8 (Optional)
gap: Sets the gap between items (CSS value). Default: '15px' (Optional)
enhancedScrollbar: Enables/disables the custom scrollbar (true/false). Default: false (Optional)
prevButtonContent: Content of the previous button. Default: '<' (Optional)
nextButtonContent: Content of the next button. Default: '>' (Optional)
- target is a required parameter that specifies the container for the slider.
- All other configuration options are optional and have default values.
